data.actual_result: The 'Receive notifications within Discord' is unchecked.
data.expected_result: The 'Receive notifications within Discord' should still be checked.
data.short_description: When I turn on 'Receive notifications within Discord', after about a day, the box is unchecked! **[Device Specific]**
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on 'Receive notifications within Discord'. - Wait a day. - Look at the setting again.
